list.name: Default
list.comment: Adding and deleting new sources records to the Knowledge database is now possible. Minor UI changes

task.summary: Added Tool controller enabling extracting zip files and converting from XMl to JSON
Implemented tools for extracting zip files and converting from XML to JSON
Merged loading of USPTO data into this project. Now loading of USPTO patent data can be initiated from the GUI.
Adding and deleting new sources records to the Knowledge database is now possible. Minor UI changes
